kpi.name: M1008C243

kpi_info.title: INTER RNC HHO ATTEMPTS DUE TO HSPA SCC
kpi_info.use: The number of inter-RNC hard handover attempts due to HSPA serving cell change. This counter is updated only for the HSPA serving cell before the HHO operation. UPDATED:When the source-RNC sends RANAP: RELOCATION REQUIRED to the core network for preparing the inter-RNC HHO.

kpi.kpi_alias: INTER RNC HHO ATTEMPTS DUE TO HSPA SCC
